purpose: Enable employees to request company-approved devices through a self-service Power App, triggering approval workflows and integrating with internal policies.

mvp_components.app_details: A Power Apps Canvas App that allows employees to browse and request company-approved devices, with integration to Azure AD for user data.

app_screens.screen_details: Browse available devices, view specs, photos, availability, and filter by department-approved models.
Form to select device, justify business need, select urgency level, and auto-populate employee name/department from Azure AD.
Confirm order details before submission, with a clean and accessible design.

mvp_components.flow_details: Workflow to manage the approval process, with notifications and a 2 business day SLA for decisions.

flow_actions.action_details: Manager receives a notification for a new approval request.
Manager can approve or reject the request with comments.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allow employees to view the status of their requests and receive email notifications at each step. Include an optional Power BI dashboard for tracking.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: PowerBI dashboard is recommended for its integration capabilities with Power Platform and ability to provide real-time insights.

post_mvp_modules.details: Admin screen to update stock levels and mark orders as fulfilled, with integration to procurement systems like SAP.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the Canvas App with additional screens for inventory management to keep the user experience consistent and leverage the existing data model in Dataverse.

constraints: Must use Power Apps Canvas App
Data must be stored in Dataverse
Approval process must use Power Automate
Device models filtered by department policy
App must support desktop + mobile usage
No external users (internal only via Azure AD)
integration_points: Power Automate for approvals and notifications
notes: The design should be clean and corporate with a responsive layout for phone and desktop. Dropdowns, cards, and status icons should be used for a better user experience. The design must also be accessible (WCAG AA).
